document.full_text: a jury on wednesday sentenced a second member of a small arizona border vigilante group to death for gunning down a man and his 9-year-old daughter during a home invasion two years ago.
document.title: arizona jury condemns second vigilante to death
lines_and_colors: a jury on wednesday sentenced a second member of a small arizona border vigilante group to death for gunning down a man and his 9-year-old daughter during a home invasion two years ago.
